verses.verse: How the city <S%H5892><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> solitary, <S%H910><s%> that was full <S%H7227><s%> of people! <S%H5971><s%> She has become as a widow, <S%H490><s%> who was great <S%H7227><s%> among the nations! <S%H1471><s%> She who was a princess <S%H8282><s%> among the provinces <S%H4082><s%> has become tributary! <S%H4522><s%>

She weeps <S%H1058><s%> bitterly <S%H1058><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> and her tears <S%H1832><s%> are on her cheeks; <S%H3895><s%> among all her lovers <S%H157><s%> she has none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> her: <S%H7453><s%> All her friends have dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with her; <S%H341><s%> they are become her enemies.

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is gone into captivity <S%H1540><s%> because of affliction, <S%H6040><s%> and because of great <S%H7230><s%> servitude; <S%H5656><s%> she dwells <S%H3427><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> she finds <S%H4672><s%> no rest: <S%H4494><s%> all her persecutors <S%H7291><s%> overtook <S%H5381><s%> her within the straits. <S%H4712><s%>

The ways <S%H1870><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> do mourn, <S%H57><s%> because none come <S%H935><s%> to the solemn assembly; <S%H4150><s%> all her gates <S%H8179><s%> are desolate, <S%H8074><s%> her priests <S%H3548><s%> do sigh: <S%H584><s%> her virgins <S%H1330><s%> are afflicted, <S%H3013><s%> and she herself is in bitterness. <S%H4843><s%>

Her adversaries <S%H6862><s%> are become the head, <S%H7218><s%> her enemies <S%H341><s%> prosper; <S%H7951><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has afflicted <S%H3013><s%> her for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of her transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> her young children <S%H5768><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the adversary. <S%H6862><s%>

From the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> all her majesty <S%H1926><s%> is departed: <S%H3318><s%> her princes <S%H8269><s%> are become like harts <S%H354><s%> that find <S%H4672><s%> no pasture, <S%H4829><s%> they are gone <S%H3212><s%> without strength <S%H3581><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the pursuer. <S%H7291><s%>

Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> remembers <S%H2142><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her affliction <S%H6040><s%> and of her miseries <S%H4788><s%> all her pleasant things <S%H4262><s%> that were from the days <S%H3117><s%> of old: <S%H6924><s%> when her people <S%H5971><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the adversary, <S%H6862><s%> and no one helped <S%H5826><s%> her, <S%H6862><s%> The adversaries saw <S%H7200><s%> her, <S%H7832><s%> they mocked at her desolations. <S%H4868><s%>

Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> has grievously <S%H2399><s%> sinned; <S%H2398><s%> therefore she has become <S%H5206><s%> as an unclean thing; <S%H3513><s%> all who honored her despise <S%H2107><s%> her, <S%H7200><s%> because they have seen her nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> yes, <S%H584><s%> she sighs, and turns <S%H7725><s%> backward. <S%H268><s%>

Her filthiness <S%H2932><s%> was in her skirts; <S%H7757><s%> she didn't <S%H2142><s%> remember her latter end; <S%H319><s%> therefore is she come down <S%H3381><s%> wonderfully; <S%H6382><s%> she has no comforter: <S%H5162><s%> see, <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my affliction; <S%H6040><s%> for the enemy <S%H341><s%> has magnified himself. <S%H1431><s%>

The adversary <S%H6862><s%> has spread out <S%H6566><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on all her pleasant things: <S%H4261><s%> for she has seen <S%H7200><s%> that the nations <S%H1471><s%> are entered <S%H935><s%> into her sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> concerning whom you commanded <S%H6680><s%> that they should not enter <S%H935><s%> into your assembly. <S%H6951><s%>

All her people <S%H5971><s%> sigh, <S%H584><s%> they seek <S%H1245><s%> bread; <S%H3899><s%> they have given <S%H5414><s%> their pleasant things <S%H4261><s%> for food <S%H400><s%> to refresh <S%H7725><s%> the soul: <S%H5315><s%> look, <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and see; <S%H7200><s%> for I am become abject. <S%H2151><s%>

Is it nothing to you, <S%H5674><s%> all you who pass by? <S%H1870><s%> Look, <S%H5027><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> if there is <S%H3426><s%> any sorrow <S%H4341><s%> like my sorrow, <S%H4341><s%> which is brought <S%H5953><s%> on me, <S%H3068><s%> With which Yahweh has afflicted <S%H3013><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger. <S%H639><s%>

From on high <S%H4791><s%> has he sent <S%H7971><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> into my bones, <S%H6106><s%> and it prevails <S%H7287><s%> against them; <S%H6566><s%> He has spread a net <S%H7568><s%> for my feet, <S%H7272><s%> he has turned <S%H7725><s%> me back: <S%H268><s%> He has made <S%H5414><s%> me desolate <S%H8074><s%> and faint <S%H1739><s%> all the day. <S%H3117><s%>

The yoke <S%H5923><s%> of my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> is bound <S%H8244><s%> by his hand; <S%H3027><s%> They are knit <S%H8276><s%> together, <S%H5927><s%> they have come up on my neck; <S%H6677><s%> he has made my strength <S%H3581><s%> to fail: <S%H3782><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> me into their hands, <S%H3027><s%> against whom I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to stand. <S%H6965><s%>

The Lord <S%H136><s%> has set at nothing <S%H5541><s%> all my mighty <S%H47><s%> men in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of me; <S%H7121><s%> He has called a solemn assembly <S%H4150><s%> against me to crush <S%H7665><s%> my young men: <S%H970><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> has trodden <S%H1869><s%> as in a winepress <S%H1660><s%> the virgin <S%H1330><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

For these things I weep; <S%H1058><s%> my eye, <S%H5869><s%> my eye <S%H5869><s%> runs down <S%H3381><s%> with water; <S%H4325><s%> Because the comforter <S%H5162><s%> who should refresh <S%H7725><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> is far <S%H7368><s%> from me: <S%H1121><s%> My children are desolate, <S%H8074><s%> because the enemy <S%H341><s%> has prevailed. <S%H1396><s%>

Zion <S%H6726><s%> spreads forth <S%H6566><s%> her hands; <S%H3027><s%> there is none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> her; <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh has commanded <S%H6680><s%> concerning Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> that those who are around <S%H5439><s%> him should be his adversaries: <S%H6862><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is among them as an unclean thing. <S%H5079><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is righteous; <S%H6662><s%> for I have rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against his commandment: <S%H6310><s%> Please hear <S%H8085><s%> all you peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> my sorrow: <S%H4341><s%> My virgins <S%H1330><s%> and my young men <S%H970><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>

I called <S%H7121><s%> for my lovers, <S%H157><s%> but they deceived <S%H7411><s%> me: <S%H3548><s%> My priests and my elders <S%H2205><s%> gave up the spirit <S%H1478><s%> in the city, <S%H5892><s%> While they sought <S%H1245><s%> them food <S%H400><s%> to refresh <S%H7725><s%> their souls. <S%H5315><s%>

See, <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for I am in distress; <S%H6887><s%> my heart <S%H4578><s%> is troubled; <S%H2560><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me; <S%H4784><s%> for I have grievously rebelled: <S%H4784><s%> Abroad <S%H2351><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> bereaves, <S%H7921><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%> there is as death. <S%H4194><s%>

They have heard <S%H8085><s%> that I sigh; <S%H584><s%> there is none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> me; <S%H341><s%> All my enemies have heard <S%H8085><s%> of my trouble; <S%H7451><s%> they are glad <S%H7797><s%> that you have done <S%H6213><s%> it: <S%H935><s%> You will bring the day <S%H3117><s%> that you have proclaimed, <S%H7121><s%> and they shall be like me. <S%H3644><s%>

Let all their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H5953><s%> Do to them, <S%H5953><s%> as you have done to me for all my transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> For my sighs <S%H585><s%> are many, <S%H7227><s%> and my heart <S%H3820><s%> is faint. <S%H1742><s%>
